loops-code-question5_key2: Take `input` of `weights` of 11 people and then print their `average` and then check whether the `average weight` is a multiple of 5 or not? This means that when you will divide the `average weight by 5`, the remainder should be `0`.
loops-code-question5_key4: Here you have to use `input` function. You can also use raw `input` to take the weights as `inputs`, inside the `loop`.
